readability_reflection: The strings where the whole string was surrounded by "", for exampled the website one where it would have the interpolation inside the string.
comprehension_debugging: Challenges was being able to look at every character to make sure I was reading what was going to be outputed. Advantages where the interpolation was inside the string was much easier.
preference_rationale: I would probably choose interpolation for an easier read through and for easier debugging.
learning_curve: Concatenation was pretty easy as is. and I just had to kind of guess what the interpolation was as I didn't know what it was.
suggestions_improvement: Trying not to clump together items.
